DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate , HIV-negative volunteer , safety immunogenicity ALVAC-HIV MN120TMGNP ( vCP300 ) follow combined boost use rgp120/HIV-1SF2 . To compare ALVAC-HIV vCP300 ALVAC-RG rabies glycoprotein ( vCP65 ) control . To evaluate accelerated immunization schedule 0 , 1 , 3 , 6 month versus 0 , 1 , 6 , 9 month . The combination live recombinant primer follow subunit boost potential induce cytotoxic T lymphocytes also neutralize antibody .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Safety Immunogenicity Trial Live Recombinant Canarypox ALVAC-HIV vCP300 HIV-1 SF-2 rgp120 HIV-1 Uninfected Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The combination live recombinant primer follow subunit boost potential induce cytotoxic T lymphocytes also neutralize antibody . Volunteers randomize one seven group receive immunization either ALVAC-HIV vCP300 ALVAC-RG vCP65 ( control ) , plus simultaneous sequential boost rgp120/HIV-1SF2 placebo . Immunizations give 0 , 1 , 6 , 9 month 0 , 1 , 3 , 6 month . Volunteers follow least 24 month .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers must : Normal history physical exam . ELISA Western blot negative HIV . CD4 count > = 400 cells/mm3 . Normal urine dipstick esterase nitrite . Lower risk sexual behavior . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Subjects follow symptoms condition exclude : Positive hepatitis B surface antigen . Medical psychiatric condition ( recent suicidal ideation present psychosis ) preclude compliance . Active syphilis . NOTE : Subjects serology document false positive due remote ( > 6 month ) treat infection eligible . Active tuberculosis . NOTE : Subjects positive PPD normal chest xray show evidence TB require isoniazid therapy eligible . Allergy egg product neomycin . Subjects follow prior condition exclude : History immunodeficiency , chronic illness , autoimmune disease , use immunosuppressive medication . History anaphylaxis serious adverse reaction vaccine . Prior immunization rabies . History serious allergic reaction substance , require hospitalization emergent medical care ( e.g. , StevensJohnson syndrome , bronchospasm , hypotension ) . Prior psychiatric condition ( history suicide attempt past psychosis ) preclude compliance . History cancer unless surgical excision consider achieved cure . Prior Medication : Excluded : Live attenuate vaccine within 60 day prior study entry . NOTE : Medically indicate kill subunit vaccine ( e.g. , influenza , pneumococcal ) exclude administer least 2 week HIV immunization . Experimental agent within 30 day prior study entry . Prior HIV vaccine . Prior rabies immunization . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Blood product immunoglobulin within 6 month prior study entry . Identifiable highrisk behavior HIV infection , injection drug use within past 12 month . high intermediate risk sexual behavior .
